    Saint Christopher’s Blog

    Welcome to Saint Christopher’s Blog. Here you will find articles on Spirituality, Wellbeing and Buddhism. As Lao Tzu once said; ‘A good traveler has no fixed plans and is not intent upon arriving’. Please do bookmark my blog so that you can save it for future reference. You can also find my latest articles by clicking on the posts button in the top right hand corner.
